work: Tractates on the Gospel of John
excerpt: For God so loved the world: therefore He loved us before we loved Him. For how would we love, unless He loved us first?
summary: Augustine stresses God's prior love that awakens our love and faith.
citation: Augustine, Tractates on the Gospel of John, Tractate 12

summary: Calvin highlights the universal gospel offer and the promise to believers.
